name: Screen-cap
body:
A simple screen capturing utility. Currently supports the following features -

1. Allows you to capture screens every **X** seconds.
2. Can be used for monitoring by capturing screens randomly once every **X** seconds.
3. Supports two image formats - **jpg** and **png**
4. Supports the ability to scale images to a certain percentage. This helps in reducing image size.
5. Supports the ability to reduce the quality of the images.

### Platform

Currently only runs x64 Linux based operating systems. 

### Support
Having some trouble? Would like a feature? Please head over to [Github issues](https://github.com/Abijeet/screen-cap/issues).

### Known Issues

1. Clicking on the restore icon once is not enough, you'll have to click it twice when screen-cap is set to start in minimize mode, and minimize to tray is set.

### About
Built using Qt5.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
